level3: A one-year-old baby climbed aboard a bus on his own in Central China.
Passengers volunteered to take care of the baby until the police got there.
Officers managed to track down his parents an hour later with the mother saying that her little boy was playing outside her cell phone store when she realised that he had gone off somewhere.
Student activists at the University of North Carolina held a rally on campus last week, seeking the removal of a Confederate statue known as ‘Silent Sam’.
As they saw the statue as a symbol of racist heritage, they suddenly toppled it several hours into the protest.
The University condemned the destruction and police made one arrest.
